_sText:
Mt_sonic

by ZaLoS

skybox by Karatekaefer

custom textures by ZaLoS, IceCreamLock


I decided to go with a theme based on one of my favorite games. My goal was to give people the feel for speed as these marbles go careening down the track!

-Features custom sounds from the game. However, the song from the vid is not included in the map.

-This map is chaos driven, thus it doesnt always work out perfect, but its still fun when it doesnt! :D

-The first ball is to represent sonic while the second tails.

-I had a lot of fun making this, I hope you have fun viewing it. I hit max_map_planes and almost max_map_overlays. lol. There are suppose to be a lots more curves in those ramps as well as more rings/brushwork but I had to cut back in order to compile.

-This map was compiled in HDR, if you dont like hdr you can turn it off with mat_hdr_enabled 0
 

Running instructions: 
Made this in the cs:s game environment. It includes a spawn spot for T if you prefer to noclip rather than spectate. I suggest reloading the map each time you want to restart the marbles, otherwise things parented to the marbles will not be reset, however it is not a huge issue.


vid:



http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OR_tOU5fvu4
